title: Don’t tell the poros, but Snowdown’s nearly over!

replies.body:
does this mean URF will be back
all who want URF back upvote this comment
I also want URF to come back but i know it most likely wont. {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
They said it is coming but no one is sure about dates. I'm thinking back on April fools again...
I think that on april fools day they are gonna put it in there but when you get into game it is just norms or maybe vice versa
genius {{champion:74}}
URF 4thewin BRING BACK URF RIOT

I'm not really good in english cause I'm french but if I understand at 2:30 they said the U.R.F mod fair pre-saison 2015 !

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i5FOq93R29A
i want URF back
um what is URF? please dont curse :

really? you missed URF?

It's basically no mana or energy costs, and straight up 80% CDR.
Thank you so much for not being mean to another player, maybe this community isn't as bad as I thought
URF is the Ultra Rapid Fire, it came out last April foolz

urf is coming back !!
http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/reworks-u-r-f-and-dragons-things-to-look-forward-to-in-2015-31583/
Great Scott!

To be Honest I Liked URF But After The Few Weeks It Was On For I Was Really Over It And Was Just Looking To Play A Normal's...
Also I Did Enjoy The Doom Bots But Believe There Should Be A Doom PvP Event Where Both Teams Consist Of Players With Doom Bots Moves And Ability's For An All Out Epic Battle!
I have thought the same thing!
I have thought the same thing!
I have thought the same thing!
tbh i didnt really likethe poro thingy
no one did
I've only received the King Poro icon even though I've unlocked all three.. it's been about 2 weeks!
people need to stop asking for urf the more you ask the more they are gonna put it off
no we need urf{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
Legend of the Poro king was another great game mode. Thanks for a great snowdown Riot.
lol sozzy brbdoingwraiths.......i hated the poro snow down........im just being honest
Thank Heaven!

RIOT this is off topic but your support website is down and i keep getting a rads error. Please help me i cant go on LOL and i want to check my mystery skin.
pls help riot others are having the same issue
do you think we are wining a mystery skin like N.A server ? ( and plz give urf mod :( )
IS the 790 rp gone
somone needs to make a "make URF perm" petition :D so riot can see how many people want it!!

Maybe Rito should just post a big header above every comment section saying "URF is coming back, please don't spam post for it." They've already said it's coming back, but some people just think that spamming comments and forums will help.
please bring back urf
I hope URF took {{summoner:10}} when he got eaten so URF mode can comeback.

when URF went, I asked people if they thought it would come back :0,
did I start the "I want URF back"?
Nah give us ranked 3s!!!
I want the champ URF :)
BRING URF BACK PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
If they don't bring URF back this year im going to stop buying riot points {{item:3151}}
stuff just URF bring back URF and OFA together thats what im talking about that one be one hectic game mode
please senpai URF
{{summoner:2}}
{{champion:201}} this guy loves the poros so do i{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} we love u poros
i love u poros see u next year bbbbbbuuuuuttt riot plz ring back urf mode :'(
Yeah it be nice if URF was back. Man, those were the days.
{{summoner:30}}
URF is positively the most fun and interesting gamemode they ever made up till now.
